article.title: Belgian_%28disambiguation%29
article.paragraph: BelgiaorBelgianrefer to something or someone of, or related to,Belgium.

list.listitem: A person from Belgium, or of Belgian descent. For information about the Belgian people, seeBelgians,Demographics of BelgiumandCulture of Belgium. For specific persons, seeList of Belgians
Belgian language, an extinct language formerly spoken in Gallia BelgicaBelgian DutchandBelgian French, variants of Dutch and French, respectively
SS Belgian, a cargo ship in service with F Leyland & Co Ltd from 1919 to 1934
SS Belgia, a passenger ship in service with the Gotha Line from 1930 to 1941
